mapper.update: update invoice set CustomerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, InvoiceDate = #{invoicedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BillingAddress = #{billingaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingCity = #{billingcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingState = #{billingstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingCountry = #{billingcountry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BillingPostalCode = #{billingpostalcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Total = #{total,jdbcType=INTEGER} where InvoiceId = #{invoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select InvoiceId, CustomerId, InvoiceDate, BillingAddress, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingCountry, BillingPostalCode, Total from invoice where InvoiceId = #{invoiceid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select InvoiceId, CustomerId, InvoiceDate, BillingAddress, BillingCity, BillingState, BillingCountry, BillingPostalCode, Total from invoice
